title: Draven Ward pink Ward showing up as Starcall Ward.
body: Hey just noticed that my Draven Ward skin is showing up as Star Call ward skins whenever I place down pick wards. Anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working on a fix!
I have the Poro Ward Skin. When I place a pink ward, I get the Battlecast ward, but this only happens when I use the upgraded Vision Totem.

I get the lunar revel ward skin for my pinks, but only when I use the trinket.

It's kind of funny to me, I wouldn't mind if this was never fixed.
ya i have the golden goal and my pink shows up as this red and blue with a golden star thingy.
